name: Paths We Travel
description:
A student-made game project for Studio 694, WCG's in-house game development team. Created by @AmberSilcock (Amber's portfolio can be found here)

Wanderer, we call upon you to find and acquire the orb of life to bring purity to our home. Death has summoned portals of destruction and we need your energy to cleanse them. Restore balance to our land.

Sacrifice a living flower to travel to the life plane, replenish your weapon’s power with pure energy. Use this energy to cleanse portals in the normal plane and restore the balance of life and death.

Restore the balance of life and death by cleansing the portals.

WASD to move

Space to jump

E to pick up flowers or cleanse portals.

X to travel to another plane.

Esc to return to the main menu

Follow us at @WCGamesArt

All Studio 694's games are made by students as part of their coursework. We do our best but please expect bugs / glitches / other unexpected strangeness.
